text: وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا يُرْجَعُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And he was arrogant, he and his soldiers, in the land, without right, and they thought that they would not be returned to Us.
translation.id.indonesian: dan berlaku angkuhlah Fir'aun dan bala tentaranya di bumi (Mesir) tanpa alasan yang benar dan mereka menyangka bahwa mereka tidak akan dikembalikan kepada Kami.
